about_the_game:
Rappan Athuk - Level 5D

Level 5D: How Green Was My Dungeon

By Bill Webb & Tom Knauss

"However, as their deity's influence waned and Tsathogga's increased, their diminishing numbers could no longer fend off the influx of monstrous denizens and the Frog God's crazed servants pouring into the region. Under Damarren's guidance, his remaining forces retreated into the Dungeon of Graves itself..."

Rappan Athuk - The Granddaddy of All Dungeons Receives a FIFTH LEVEL!

Rappan Athuk, the legendary mega-dungeon by Frog God Games and Necromancer Games.

Rappan Athuk will truly strike fear into the hearts of the most stalwart adventurers. It offers legions of inventive traps, tricks, strange features, and monsters -- many of them never before seen. It affords numerous opportunities for roleplaying, but anyone willing to brave these subterranean halls better arrive ready to rumble, or their lives will be short indeed.

Venture onto the fifth floor of this celebrated mega-dungeon.

An adventure for 4 - 6 PCs

Character Levels 15 - 20 "
